mapper.select:
select DISTINCT p.ID ID, p.projectNum projectNum, p.projectName projectName, p.createTime createTime, p.visitorVolume visitorVolume, p.inteProType inteProType from project_info p join t_users_roles t ON p.ID = t.PROJECTID WHERE p.STATUS <> 4
AND t.USERID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
